title: Arsenal v Tottenham - 04-Jan-2014 - MPEG - English - Slimoo
description:
Arsenal v Tottenham - 04-Jan-2014 - MPEG - English




I personally can't see why people spend hours encoding a high quality rip for a torrent that will be dead within a few days.


Most downloaders want it fast to avoid the result

So this is why I post as - Simple edits, Post as it is recorded, A MPEG.

Posted in 2 half's so you can be watching the first half as the 2nd downloads



Put your brain in gear if you want this faster:

Download the first half, be watching that while the second half downloads.

If you want this torrent faster STOP all other torrent until this is complete
Torrents reciprocate - The More > YOU < are Uploading the more > YOU < usually download
 


By posting a Mpeg, matches can be posted (If all goes well) 5 to 10 minutes after [b]The Final whistle [/b]
 

Some players will still be on the pitch when the download is available


So - This is

 A TVrip

 Match Only (No pundits)

 English




((( I find this Best watched with Windows Media Player (Not VLC!) ))) 


 
 

Warning:
Reading comments is always a bad idea on sports torrents
Some idiot will think it's so funny to give the result


Silly nasty comments is the reason so few post sports torrents
